accessibility.text: A random password has\u2028~ 6 bits per character (*)
A 128 bit key needs >= 21 character passwords
(*)  a-zA-Z0-9  —> ~64 different values per character (2^6). A 128 bit passwords must be >= 21 characters long (128/6)
